lead_paragraph: METZGER--Phoebe, 95, of Boca Raton, FL; died peacefully and naturally at home on December 29. She was the devoted wife for 64 years of Bernard (deceased). Mother of Robert and Steven, sister of Enid Lee, and brother Marvin Goldstein (deceased). She loved life with a large social circle, enjoying tennis, friendly gaming and philanthropy; she was a strong supporter of organizations for Jewish causes and the developmentally disabled. Services will be 1pm, Sunday, January 3 at Lakeside Memorial Park, Doral, FL; Shiva at the family home after 6pm. Honor her memory at JARCFL.ORG. 1/3
